data.description:
Become a Trombonest with your very own VR trombone.

Grab the slide and start playing!

Embark on a self-paced musical journey. Whether you're a novice finding your rhythm or an expert perfecting your craft.

Trombonest Features:
• Grab the slide to move the Trombone.
• Three Difficulty Modes: From beginner to advanced, master notes with perfect pitch at your own pace.
• Embouchure: Use the joystick to mimic mouth movements, unlocking a range of notes as you play.
• Visual Note Indicators: Always know what note you're playing with immediate visual feedback.
• Music Theory: Learn how to play notes in a major scale.
• Passthrough enabled: Play in Mixed Reality.

Your musical adventure awaits. Become a Trombonest with this immersive VR experience. Discover, play, and let every slide and toot tell your story.

changelog.change_log:
Fix the range of the Trombone.



The pitch has been reduced by one octave to match a Tenor Trombone.

Added a support email in the About page.



Please email support@fncore.com to report bugs or provide feedback!

Add Options Menu.



Add the option to configure the default number of partials between 4 and 7.

* Improved slide audio quality.



The sound slide sound is smooth instead of choppy between notes.

* Add a menu to the game.



You can now go back to the main menu when you're playing Trombonest. Just press the option button!

Make the Trombone Slide's frequency monotonically increasing ;) 



Rename "Hard" mode to "Advanced"
Improve sound quality with a new Trombone soundfont.

Improve Trombone audio model by smoothing note transitions.



Fix bug where Trombone would play an extra note when fully extended.
